attributes.htmlcode:
<form class="upload-form" id="resource-form-create">
	<input id="image" type="file" name="res_file"/>
</form>

<script>

var form_guid = 'cf73a2c1_28c9_4373_a2f0_2769c4806e20';
var form_file_submit = {};

function getFormData($form){
	var indexed_array = {};

	$.map($form.serializeArray(), function(n, i){
		indexed_array[n['name']] = n['value'];
	});

	return indexed_array;
}

function upload_file() {
	return new Promise(function(resolve, reject) {

		form_file_submit = getFormData($('#o_'+form_guid));
		var frm = document.getElementById("resource-form-create");
		var formData = new FormData(frm);

		var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
		xhr.open("POST", "upload.py", true);
		xhr.onload = function(event) {
			if (xhr.status == 200)
				resolve(xhr.responseText);
			else
				reject(xhr);
		}
		xhr.onerror = function(event) {
			reject(event);
		}
		xhr.send(formData);

	})
	.then(function(guid) {
		form_file_submit.res_file_id = guid.trim();
		console.log(form_file_submit);
		execEventBinded(form_guid, 'submit', form_file_submit);
	})

	.catch(function(error) {
		console.log('error', error)
	})
}

</script>
